name: Isle of Phylonn
description:
Controls:

AD keys: to move left and right

W key: to jump

Space bar:  Enter doors.  To shoot (only works when you acquire power up)

Isle of Phylonn is a exploring puzzle platformer where search the forbidden forest to find secrets hidden in a labyrinth crawling with spiders and traps. 

Find the totems of light to power up your staff and unlock mysterious switches to uncover different paths.

Find your way to the end. 

Credit!

Environment, spider and idea/story: Matthew Lenhart

Game/level design: Gerardo Tioseco

Main character sprite: Joshua Tellez

Music: The Forbidden Forest by Alexander Hoff & Fanfare for space by Kevin MacCloud both copyright free music
